Articles.Content:
Since i left [Jeb on the Duna](http://www.reddit.com/r/KerbalSpaceProgram/comments/2tnka0/stranded_on_duna/) last time, I had to draw something more cheerful. 

So here he is - waiting for the update 1.0 and it's coveted refueling option. 

![n1Ag3jv.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/n1Ag3jv.jpg)

[hi-res version](http://i.imgur.com/pnQJrUL.jpg)

[horizontal edition](http://i.imgur.com/WBmXUsL.jpg)
I can imagine Bill and Bob looking at him from the ship in horror, waiting for something to explode...
Jeb does reminds me of a crazy '49er prospector. Looks like he's struck propellium anyway ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
THIS IS GORGEOUS! Makes me sad it doesn't have more posts. Nicely done indeed.
